name: Invito alla partita
desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

value.text: Item used at the Invitation Board to invite characters to duel in Genius Invokation TCG

Sold in Card Shop
Complete Quests in TCG Player's Manual
Increase Player Level
